description:
In this recap episode, Lena reflects on the events of the past months, and how she came to meet the men and women of Spearhead.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Der Klatschmohn blüht rot auf dem Schlachtfeld
Special Edition 戦野に紅く雛罌粟の咲く
Special Edition: Sen`ya ni Akaku Hinageshi no Saku
Special Edition: The Poppies Bloom Red on the Battlefield
